data.caption: Venice
data.text: Venice, the capital of nothern Italy's Veneto region, is built on more than 100 small islands in a lagoon in the Adriatic Sea. It has no roads, just canals.

data.caption: Berlin
data.text: Berlin, Germany’s capital, is a city known for its art scene and modern landmarks.

data.caption: Barcelona
data.text: Barcelona, the cosmopolitan capital of Spain’s Catalonia region, is known for its art and architecture.

data.caption: Paris
data.text: Paris, France's capital, is a major European city and a global center for art, fashion, gastronomy and culture.

data.caption: Amsterdam
data.text: Amsterdam is the Netherlands’ capital, known for its artistic heritage, elaborate canal system and architecture.

data.caption: London
data.text: London, the capital of England and the United Kingdom, is a 21st-century city with history stretching back to Roman times.
